body_html: Updated the original with a bit of more info (training on GPU, GPU memory consumption stays constant). session.run does not hang for me, training works fine. Though this might be due to the fact that the training set itself is rather small in this case. One minibatch is of size 128x19 (float32).

body: Updated the original with a bit of more info (training on GPU, GPU memory consumption stays constant). `session.run` does not hang for me, training works fine. Though this might be due to the fact that the training set itself is rather small in this case. One minibatch is of size 128x19 (float32).
